content: l have been in this platform for sometime now and l have seen many posts including bitcoin, altcoin, beginner's help, marketplace and news about different sports, but when l wanted to post some sport news, l could not find where to do that. Can anyone tell me where l can post sport news to avoid post deleting?

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: If the sports has relation in gambling then it's okay to post that on Gambling Discussion --> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=228.0If not, then you're totally fine to post it on this section and just update your thread by posting continuously with those sports news that you like to post.Anyway, most of the sports topic are on the gambling discussion so I guess you'll be fine posting it there.
